title: EV fire incidents: Probe panel to submit report on May 30
description: "The expert committee (formed to enquire into the incidents of electric two-wheelers catching fire) will submit it's report on May 30," the official said. Road transport and highways minister Nitin Gadkari had recently said the companies found negligent will be penalised and a recall of all defective vehicles will be ordered after the expert panel submits its report.
